verses.verse: And when the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> delayed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8800><s%> out of the mount <S%H2022><s%>, the people <S%H5971><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> us 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, which shall go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us; for as for this Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, the man <S%H376><s%> that brought <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> us up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, we wot <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not what is become of him.

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Break off <S%H6561><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> earrings <S%H5141><s%>, which are in the ears <S%H241><s%> of your wives <S%H802><s%>, of your sons <S%H1121><s%>, and of your daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8685><s%> them unto me.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> brake off <S%H6561><s%> <S%H8691><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> earrings <S%H5141><s%> which were in their ears <S%H241><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>.

And he received <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them at their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and fashioned <S%H6696><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it with a graving tool <S%H2747><s%>, after he had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf <S%H5695><s%>: and they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, These be thy 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, which brought <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And when Aharon <S%H175><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it; and Aharon <S%H175><s%> made proclamation <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, To morrow <S%H4279><s%> is a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And they rose up early <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8686><s%> on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and brought <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8686><s%> peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>; and the people <S%H5971><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> down to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> and to drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to play <S%H6711><s%> <S%H8763><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, get thee down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; for thy people <S%H5971><s%>, which thou broughtest <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8765><s%> themselves:

They have turned <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%> aside quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them: they have made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf <S%H5695><s%>, and have worshipped <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> it, and have sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereunto, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, These be thy 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, O Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, which have brought thee up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>, and, behold, it is a stiffnecked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>:

Now therefore let me alone <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, that my wrath <S%H639><s%> may wax hot <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against them, and that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them: and I will make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of thee a great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> besought <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8762><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> his 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, YY <S%H3068><s%>, why doth thy wrath <S%H639><s%> wax hot <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against thy people <S%H5971><s%>, which thou hast brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%>, and with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> ?

Wherefore should the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, For mischief <S%H7451><s%> did he bring <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them out, to slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them in the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and to consume <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%> them from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>? Turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> from thy fierce <S%H2740><s%> wrath <S%H639><s%>, and repent <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8734><s%> of this evil <S%H7451><s%> against thy people <S%H5971><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> Avraham <S%H85><s%>, Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, to whom thou swarest <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> by thine own self, and saidst <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto them, I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8686><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and all this land <S%H776><s%> that I have spoken <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of will I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto your seed <S%H2233><s%>, and they shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> repented <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of the evil <S%H7451><s%> which he thought <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> were in his hand <S%H3027><s%>: the tables <S%H3871><s%> were written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> on both <S%H8147><s%> their sides <S%H5676><s%>; on the one side and on the other were they written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.

And the tables <S%H3871><s%> were the work <S%H4639><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and the writing <S%H4385><s%> was the writing <S%H4385><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, graven <S%H2801><s%> <S%H8803><s%> upon the tables <S%H3871><s%>.

And when Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> as they shouted <S%H7452><s%>, he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, There is a noise <S%H6963><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It is not the voice <S%H6963><s%> of them that shout <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for mastery <S%H1369><s%>, neither is it the voice <S%H6963><s%> of them that cry <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for being overcome <S%H2476><s%>: but the noise <S%H6963><s%> of them that sing <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8763><s%> do I hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And it came to pass, as soon as he came nigh <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the camp <S%H4264><s%>, that he saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%>, and the dancing <S%H4246><s%>: and Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> ' anger <S%H639><s%> waxed hot <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and he cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> out of his hands <S%H3027><s%>, and brake <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them beneath <S%H8478><s%> the mount <S%H2022><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> which they had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it in the fire <S%H784><s%>, and ground <S%H2912><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it to powder <S%H1854><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and strawed <S%H2219><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it upon <S%H6440><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%>, and made the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of it.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, What did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> unto thee, that thou hast brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> so great <S%H1419><s%> a sin <S%H2401><s%> upon them?

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let not the anger <S%H639><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%> wax hot <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, that they are set on mischief <S%H7451><s%>.

For they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> us 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, which shall go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us: for as for this Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, the man <S%H376><s%> that brought us up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, we wot <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not what is become of him.

And I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Whosoever hath any gold <S%H2091><s%>, let them break <S%H6561><s%> <S%H8690><s%> it off. So they gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it me: then I cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it into the fire <S%H784><s%>, and there came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this calf <S%H5695><s%>.

And when Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> were naked <S%H6544><s%> <S%H8803><s%>; (for Aharon <S%H175><s%> had made them naked <S%H6544><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto their shame <S%H8103><s%> among their enemies <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8801><s%>:)

Then Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Who is on the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> side? let him come unto me. And all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> themselves together unto him.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> by his side <S%H3409><s%>, and go <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in and out <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> from gate <S%H8179><s%> to gate <S%H8179><s%> throughout the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8798><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> his companion <S%H7453><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> his neighbour <S%H7138><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>: and there fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> about three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%>.

For Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Consecrate yourselves <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8798><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%>, even <S%H3588><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> upon his son <S%H1121><s%>, and upon his brother <S%H251><s%>; that he may bestow <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> upon you a b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And it came to pass on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, that Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Ye have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sin <S%H2401><s%>: and now I will go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; peradventure <S%H194><s%> I shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8762><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> your sin <S%H2403><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Oh <S%H577><s%>, this people <S%H5971><s%> have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sin <S%H2401><s%>, and have made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them 'elohim <S%H430><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>.

Yet now, if thou wilt forgive <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their sin <S%H2403><s%> --; and if not, blot <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me, I pray thee, out of thy book <S%H5612><s%> which thou hast written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Whosoever <S%H834><s%> hath sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against me, him will I blot out <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of my book <S%H5612><s%>.

Therefore now go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, lead <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> unto the place of which I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto thee: behold, mine Angel <S%H4397><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee: nevertheless in the day <S%H3117><s%> when I visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8800><s%> I will visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their sin <S%H2403><s%> upon them.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> plagued <S%H5062><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, because <S%H834><s%> they made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%>, which <S%H834><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
